# BITSY VERSION 3.5

DLG 10
I want to be paid without having to work. Okay, maybe it would be fun to make some uncompromising art for a living.

DLG 11
"I only date and sleep with blue benevolent minotaurs."

DLG 12
"I want to be rich NOW!"

DLG 13
I could have gone to the spelling bee, but I let my friend go instead, even though she couldn't spell "bamboozle."

DLG 14
Every town ought to have a playground for adults. It's impossible to not feel creepy on the swings when there's kids around :S

DLG 15
I'm happy that some people are able to appreciate my shirt that says "MY OTHER CAR IS A HORROR MOVIE."

DLG 16
I'm spacing out my hat consumption for maximum enjoyment.

DLG 17
"Animal husbandry" is my term for taking an idiom in its literal form.

DLG 18
I'm glad my paranoia prevents me from engaging in casual encounters.

DLG 19
I always used to tear the crispy ends off of french fries.

DLG 20
I hope to see games with friendly interactions become more common!

DLG 21
I love you :)

DLG a
The best part of mini-golf is hitting the ball; sinking the putt is just a break from the excitement.

DLG b
No-one or noone?

DLG c
The air is thick with smoke and heat, but taking the long way to the apartment is better for avoiding people.

DLG d
My friend and I were suspended from recess because I poured glue in her hands. I hope she also thought it was worth it.

DLG e
Schoolyard benches are skateboarding's white cube.

DLG f
I'm not fond of wearing light warm colours, but I have to make an exception for that pink hat, even if it doesn't match with anything I own.

DLG g
I just had peach-flavoured cream soda today. Wow.

DLG h
"Real nice boy with some damn-ass pop"

DLG i
I wish I had the patience and knowledge to program a mathrock album using nothing but GarageBand default instruments.

DLG j
I find it quite odd that man buns with shaved sides are a trend.

DLG k
I don't understand the appeal of Peanuts. Is it because it's an American tradition? I find most of it to be bland.

DLG l
What's with all of these straight boys wearing basketball shorts in public? 

DLG m
"The Doors would be better if they got rid of their stupid organ thing."

DLG n
Radioland is such a lovely song.

DLG o
Two roosters popped out from under the bushes! I didn't expect to be surprised by roosters today.

DLG p
I knew there was a reason I didn't watch serial programs...

DLG q
I've been wanting to make a golf game for months, but... I just haven't. lol :(

DLG r
I love puppies and kitties, but only when I don't live with them.

DLG s
My first kiss was... gross.

DLG t
I was kicked out of the transit center for loitering (reading a book while waiting for the following bus), even though there are always people hanging around for hours. I fantasize about calling the security guards out on their racial profiling anytime I pass that spot.

DLG u
Lactose intolerance is so shitty.

DLG v
I love a man's natural scent.

DLG w
I'm just another permanently sweaty dude.

DLG x
My donut socks could use more donuts.

DLG y
I probably should have mentioned to my psychologist that I have a difficult time paying attention to text, like when it took me 2 hours to read 6 pages of Derrida...

DLG z
I have trouble reading a book when I know there's a film adaptation, even though I'm aware the former is superior.

DLG 1a
When watching foreign films, I tend to feel like a stupid American.

DLG 1b
I'm going to make a t-shirt that says: "ANIME REVIEW: I don't like it."

DLG 1c
How is war still a thing? It's like literally the worst thing ever.

DLG 1d
I'm not 113 years old.

DLG 1e
I'm not going to pretend that the visuals are connected to the text. lol

DLG 1f
I don't understand how people listen to metal for hours on end. It hurts!

DLG 1g
Smash Bros. (and other games where in-universe allies fight each other) always make me feel uneasy.

DLG 1h
I love people, but mostly from a distance.

DLG 1i
I'm a queer person of colour with a disability. It's pretty awesome.

DLG 1j
I had her delete "Float On" because I wanted to force my friends to listen to something else.

DLG 1k
I wonder what asymptotic jumping in a platformer would be like.

DLG 1l
Nostalgia is okay, but the future is way cooler.

DLG 1m
There's way too much cool stuff to consume for one lifetime.

DLG 1n
How To Become A Picnic In 8 Steps

DLG 1o
I want a fighting game where the characters are only beefy, hairy men. No blood, of course.

DLG 1p
4X, Strategy, Management, and all types of RPGs feel like homework to me.

DLG 1q
It's odd seeing so many anti-war developers use killing so casually in their games.

DLG 1r
It's great knowing that Arca and Autechre are somewhat well-known, considering how odd their music can be.

DLG 1s
Someday, I'd love to make a visual-based game-making tool.

DLG 1t
I just don't understand why so many guys don't want a beard!

DLG 1u
I hope I have a chance to meet my favourite game developers someday!

DLG 1v
I wish more guys understood that sensuality without an end goal is great in itself!

DLG 1w
The first time I played a Bitsy game, I was so scared an enemy character was going to attack.

DLG 1x
Butts are so cool.

DLG 1y
I have to force myself to do any physical activity.

DLG 1z
Helen Keller
